#labels Phase-Deploy
Here is how to get it to work:

Checkout the code.

http://code.google.com/p/coloradocollegegame/source

Compile the code.

{{{
javac *.java
}}}

Run the Server on matheserver.

{{{
java Server
}}}

Run the Client(s)!

{{{
java Client
}}}

Move around!


Note: To make either the Server or the Client display testing messages (i.e. make it verbose)  add a -v:

{{{
java Client -v
}}}

or

{{{
java Server -v
}}}

And have fun!
